item.title: Karnataka Weather Alert: Bengaluru, Belagavi, Raichur, Bidar on High Risk; Check Dates, KSNDMC & IMD Forecast
item.description:
<![CDATA[Several districts across Karnataka have been placed on high alert following weather advisories issued by the Indian Meteorological Department (IMD) and the Karnataka State Natural Disaster Monitoring Centre (KSNDMC). The state is expected to experience thunderstorms, heavy rainfall and strong winds over the coming week, check district-wise details.
Karnataka Weather Alert: KSNDMC Predicts Heavy Rainfall Predicted; Check Dates As Per IMD Forecast
From October 8 to 10, the IMD forecasts sporadic...]]>
item.author: Oi-Harshika Yadav
